action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with all edges (top, bottom, left, right) filled with Xs, except for the middle three columns of the second and fourth rows, which are empty (▢). The center row has Xs in the last three columns, with the first two columns empty (▢).

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

X ▢ ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a border except for the middle row and column, which have some Xs missing, creating a pattern where Xs are mostly on the edges and corners, with some in the center.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with all edges (top, bottom, left, right) filled with Xs, except for the middle three columns of the second and fourth rows, which are empty (▢). The center row has Xs in the last three columns, with the first two columns empty (▢).

QUESTION: In your grid, is the center cell (third row, third column) an X or empty (▢)?
